description: A thin carved piece of wood with a comfortable handle and feathers tied into a bundle attached to the side opposite the handle. This feather duster is used to brush the dust off of surfaces without needing to pick them up or risk moving them. Despite its fragile nature it can actually hit quite hard but not for long without breaking.

description: A sheet of odd paperwork, notes scrawled across it. It seems to belong to some large organization.

//: Quest item. Bugged if you see it outside the trial maze.
name: charm of passage
description: This is a small charm, whittled from bone. Upon its surface a message reads *Return this to the senior instructor to pass your test. If you have found this by accident, leave here.*. Otherwise, it is worthless.
